title: Conquest
creator_contributor_role: Rural Bank of New South Wales, production company

description: A rural bank manager and his new recruit on horseback visit a grazier who tells the story of claiming the land only to then suffer a drought causing loss to most of his stock. However his bank came to the rescue, providing him with enough money to carry on and buy new stock and equipment. A promotional film for the Rural Bank of New South Wales. Narrated by W. Lane-Bayliff
